item.title: CVE-2021-36869|2024-08-04T01:01:59.828Z -- ivory%20search -- ivory%20search%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress Ivory Search plugin (versions <= 4.6.6). Vulnerable parameter: &post.
